availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James R. Garland (Lewis County, Kentucky, carpenter, attorney, and judge)

body.p: Lewis County, Kentucky, carpenter, attorney, and judge. Kentucky native. Married to Ruhama H. Flowers Garland. Father of Sarah F. Garland, Vinie Emma Garland, George H. Garland, Robert M. Garland, and James R. Garland, Jr. Carpenter in Lewis County, Kentucky, in 1850. Attorney in Lewis County in 1860. Judge of the Lewis County Court in Clarksburg in 1861.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lewis County, District 1, p. 231A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lewis County, p. 874.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lewis County, Vanceburg, p. 530B.
